title: Ink Scape
description: An engaging art website where users can browse pictures and contribute their own. Registered users can manage their uploads with ease and customize their experience with light/dark mode.

title: Casa Quest
description: A user-friendly real estate website designed to help users easily browse properties and save favorites to a wishlist. The platform ensures a smooth and engaging experience for finding the perfect property.

title: Saffari Tour
description: A responsive tour website showcasing packages and destinations with a user-friendly interface.
